description: Erika Cowen, who was narrowly beaten in 2019, is victorious at the World Tin Bath Championships.
title: World Tin Bath Championships: Former champion wins back crown
title_page: World Tin Bath Championships: Former champion wins back crown - BBC News
maintext: Erika Cowen took the top spot in the women's race on Saturday, a year after she was edged into second place for the first time in two decades.
